# Web Design for Tradespeople

> Websites built specifically for tradespeople. Rank on Google, capture leads 24/7 with AI. Based in Hampshire, serving the UK.

## About

Web Design for Tradespeople (WDFT) builds websites exclusively for trades — plumbers, electricians, builders, roofers, landscapers, plasterers, and carpenters. We combine professional web design with AI-powered tools (chatbots and voice receptionists) so tradespeople never miss a lead. Founded by Andy, who has 30+ years in service businesses. Based in Andover, Hampshire, working with trades across the UK.

## Contact

- Phone: 0333 335 7920
- Email: hello@webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk
- Address: 4 Highlands Road, Andover, Hampshire, SP10 2PX
- Hours: Mon–Fri 8 AM – 7 PM, Sat & Sun Closed
- Website: https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk

## Services

### Website Packages (One-Off Cost + £15/mo Hosting)

**Starter — £397**
Best for sole traders starting out. 5 pages, mobile-ready, basic on-page SEO, standard contact form, email support.

**Trades Pro — £797**
Best for established trades wanting more work. 8–10 pages, full local SEO setup, Google Business Profile setup, before/after gallery, quote request form. Includes 14-day free AI Chatbot trial.

**Full Works — £1,097**
Best for trades wanting website + SEO + the lot. Unlimited pages, full local SEO + citations, GBP setup + optimisation, video + before/after gallery, multi-step form + WhatsApp. Includes 3-month free AI Chatbot trial.

All packages include £15/month for hosting, SSL certificate, security updates, basic content changes, and email support.

### AI Add-Ons (Monthly)

**AI Chatbot — £47/mo**
Chat widget on your website. Answers FAQs, captures leads, sends summaries. Works 24/7. Setup included. Every site comes with a free 14-day trial.

**AI Receptionist — £97/mo**
AI answers your actual phone. Takes messages, books jobs, handles enquiries. Sounds like a real person. No setup fee.

## Trades We Serve

- [Plumbers](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/plumbers): Emergency callout buttons, Gas Safe badges, local SEO, AI receptionist.
- [Electricians](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/electricians): NICEIC badges, local SEO for "electrician near me" searches, AI call handling.
- [Builders](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/builders): Project galleries, case studies for extensions, renovations, and new builds.
- [Roofers](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/roofers): Storm damage buttons, before/after galleries, NFRC badges.
- [Landscapers](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/landscapers): Before/after photo galleries, seasonal service highlights.
- [Plasterers](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/plasterers): Showcase skimming, rendering, and dry lining work.
- [Carpenters](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/carpenters): Showcase craftsmanship with portfolio galleries.

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk): Trade websites that actually get you work.
- [Pricing](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/pricing): Straight-up pricing. No hidden fees. No surprises.
- [AI Receptionist](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/ai-receptionist): AI voice receptionist and chatbot. Never miss a call. Certified Retell AI Partner.
- [SEO](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/seo): Local SEO for trades. Google Business Profile setup, on-page optimisation, content strategy.
- [Portfolio](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/portfolio): Real trade websites we have built that capture leads and rank on Google.
- [About](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/about): Meet Andy. 30+ years in service businesses, now building websites for trades.
- [Contact](https://www.webdesignfortradespeople.co.uk/contact): Get a free quote. Call, email, or fill in our form.

## Pricing FAQ

**How much does a trade website cost?**
Starter is £397 one-off for a 5-page website. Then £15/mo for hosting, SSL and support.

**What's included in the £15/mo?**
Hosting, SSL certificate, security updates, basic content changes and email support.

**Can I cancel anytime?**
Yes. No long contracts.

**How much are the AI add-ons?**
AI Chatbot is £47/mo. AI Receptionist is £97/mo. Both come with a free trial.

**What if I already have a website?**
We redesign it. Trades Pro and Full Works include migrating content and setting up redirects.

**How long does it take?**
Starter: 1–2 weeks. Trades Pro: 2–3 weeks. Full Works: 3–4 weeks.

**Do you work outside Hampshire?**
Yes. Based in Hampshire, build for trades across the UK. Most work is remote.
